amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used for the purpose of enforcing the final judgement of the Federal District Court for the Southern District of Indiana issued in Hinrichs v. Bosma concerning the Indiana State Legislature.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the purpose of enforcing the final judgement of the Federal District Court for the Southern District of Indiana issued in Hinrichs v. Bosma.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sodrel amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 174, 1 Present (Roll no. 345).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Sodrel.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sodrel amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 174, 1 Present (Roll no. 345).
